mapper.insert: INSERT INTO role (id, role_name, role_sign, description) VALUES ( #{id}, #{roleName}, #{roleSign}, #{description} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM role r LEFT JOIN student_role sr ON r.id = sr.role_id WHERE sr.student_id = #{id}
SELECT r.* FROM role r LEFT JOIN teacher_role tr ON r.id = tr.role_id WHERE tr.teacher_id = #{id}
